subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea beat Manchester United, 2-1, in a dramatic match on Saturday to pull even at the top of the English Premier League and keep alive its hopes of snatching the title from United’s grasp.
snippet: Chelsea beat Manchester United, 2-1, in a dramatic match on Saturday to pull even at the top of the English Premier League and keep alive its hopes of snatching the title from United’s grasp.
